properties.value: This page contains a list of all of the tasks in the Trailblazer League. Completing tasks during the league allows players to earn league points and unlock relics that buff their character. Tasks span five difficulty levels - Easy, Medium, Hard, Elite, and Master.

content:
This page contains a list of all of the tasks in the Trailblazer League. Completing tasks during the league allows players to earn league points and unlock relics that buff their character. Tasks span five difficulty levels - Easy, Medium, Hard, Elite, and Master.

Trailblazer task complete
The jingle that plays upon completing a task.

Tasks per region are as follows:

Tirannwn 9 7 19 20 4 59 9,340
Wilderness 15 19 14 22 4 74 10,000

General/Multiple Regions[edit | edit source]

For a page listing just the clue tasks, see this page.

With 83 tasks available, there are a total of 830 league points that can be earned from easy tasks.

Master[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 500 league points upon completion.

With 4 tasks available, there are a total of 2,000 league points that can be earned from master tasks.

Equip an Amulet of Eternal Glory Equip an amulet of eternal glory. N/A Completion of Heroes' Quest (auto-completed for ).
